meanings.sent1: The flower was bractless, with no extra leaves around its base.
meanings.sent2: The bractless plant stood tall in the garden, showing off its simple beauty.
meanings.sent3: The bractless tree felt left out at the botanical party, wishing it had some fancy decorations.
meanings.sent4: Her bractless hair flowed freely in the wind, unadorned and natural.
meanings.sent5: The bractless landscape seemed stark and minimalist, devoid of any unnecessary frills.

meanings.sent1: The bractless stem of the flower surprised the botanist, who expected to see some extra leaves.
meanings.sent2: In the field, the bractless plants blended in seamlessly with their surroundings.
meanings.sent3: The bractless bouquet looked incomplete without the usual greenery mixed in.
meanings.sent4: The bractless branches of the tree reached towards the sky, unadorned and elegant.
meanings.sent5: The bractless arrangement highlighted the beauty of each individual flower, standing out on its own.
